text: Just Imagine is a 1930 American science fiction musical comedy movie directed by David Butler and stars El Brendel, Maureen O'Sullivan, John Garrick, Marjorie White, Frank Albertson. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1931. ==Other websites== * * Category:1930 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:1930s science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by David Butler
title: Just Imagine
